description: Brad is a wild guy, and a lot of fun to be around.It took all our crew had just to stay focused as it seemed that Brad was always cracking a joke or goofing around. That was fine by us, it made working with him all the more enjoyable.Brad is a college junior who is very smart, but parties harder than most of the guys we've met with before. He says he's looking for women who can satisfy his wild side. They're out there Brad, we know you're not going to have any trouble finding them.
title: Brad
